failure.message:
Error: Error: expect(received).toBe(expected) // Object.is equality
Expected: "Authorization header requires 'Credential' parameter. Authorization header requires 'Signature' parameter. Authorization header requires 'SignedHeaders' parameter. Authorization={\"body\":\"An error occurred (UserNotConfirmedException) when calling the InitiateAuth operation: User is not confirmed.\",\"statusCode\":500,\"headers\":{\"Content-Type\":\"application/json\"}}" Received: "'error' not a valid key=value pair (missing equal-sign) in Authorization header: '{\"body\":\"An error occurred (UserNotConfirmedException) when calling the InitiateAuth operation: User is not confirmed.\",\"statusCode\":500,\"headers\":{\"Content-Type\":\"application/json\"}}'."
